headline: Quotation of the Day: Stark Transformation From Ohio Moderate to Trump’s ‘No. 1 Ally’
sentences:
“The Josh Mandel of 2003 — of 2016, even — would not recognize the Josh Mandel of 2021.”
ROB ZIMMERMAN, a Democrat who raised funds for Mr. Mandel, a Republican Senate candidate from Ohio who has taken a hard right turn politically from his moderate roots.
